experience.title: Human Resources Specialist and promoter
experience.description: Working as a Campus Recruiter, the main focus is to promote Jaro as a brand inorder to develop a positive environment within the campus and ensure that we attract the best and brightest students.• Build and sustain relationships with campuses to meet the hiring requirements.• Handle the complete recruitment life cycle and streamline the current recruitingprocess.• Responsible for supporting and handling all campus related recruitment activities.• Responsible for PAN India Campus recruitments, coordinating with placement officersfor campus drives. Visiting college’s job fairs, conducting pre-placement presentation,group discussions, personal interviews etc.• Building relationships with college TPOs/Directors/Representatives etc.• Working as a Recruiter, handled End-to-End Recruitment, right from sourcing, screening,scheduling, conducting interviews and follow-ups, and closures & joining of candidates.Maintaining database.• Evaluating the candidate skills and competencies.• Involved in Resourcing activity for junior, Middle and Senior Level Managementpositions for the clients.• Working according to the KRA. Analyzing the requirements.
experience.description_html: Working as a Campus Recruiter, the main focus is to promote Jaro as a brand inorder to develop a positive environment within the campus and ensure that we attract the best and brightest students.• Build and sustain relationships with campuses to meet the hiring requirements.• Handle the complete recruitment life cycle and streamline the current recruitingprocess.• Responsible for supporting and handling all campus related recruitment activities.• Responsible for PAN India Campus recruitments, coordinating with placement officersfor campus drives. Visiting college’s job fairs, conducting pre-placement presentation,group discussions, personal interviews etc.• Building relationships with college TPOs/Directors/Representatives etc.• Working as a Recruiter, handled End-to-End Recruitment, right from sourcing, screening,scheduling, conducting interviews and follow-ups, and closures & joining of candidates.Maintaining database.• Evaluating the candidate skills and competencies.• Involved in Resourcing activity for junior, Middle and Senior Level Managementpositions for the clients.• Working according to the KRA. Analyzing the requirements.

experience.title: Human Resources Manager
experience.description: Generate placement, internship opportunities for students by establishing and maintaining productive employer partnerships.Approaching the colleges through email and personal visits to develop partnerships and placements.Heading Corporate Relations, Corporate Outreach, Main role is Corporate On-Boarding (COB).Lead Generation through various sources.Help students identify employment options that match their career interests.Assist students in all aspects of the job search by providing training in the areas of resume writing, interviewing techniques, Aptitude, Soft Skills...etc.Schedule and follow up on student interviews with prospective employers.Participate in coordination and organisation of on-campus events such as pool campuses, Guest Sessions, Workshops...etc.Ensure that new jobs and internships opportunities or any other placement related information are communicated and posted in time on all valid platforms.Handle all the operations related to the placement cell of the Institute.Schedule and advertise campus recruitment for employers and build a strong network in the TPO community as well.Creating and maintaining employer and student database(s). Strengthening Alumni relations.Coordinate with concerned faculties or external parties for preparations of students for various placement opportunities.Attend seminars and other training opportunities for professional development.Signing up the MOUs with the Companies.
